Articles.Content:
Hey - quick question, done some searching but I can't seem to find an answer...but it appears I don't have permission to create a signature? Is there a minimum time on forums or post number required before this unlocked?

Thanks much
Last I checked, you needed five posts to be able to do that.
Yep, you need 5 posts for most permissions. It's a spam prevention thing.

Excellent, I thought it was something along those lines, just wanted an idea of the threshold. thanks guys!

Driachan
I've made five posts, and still don't have permission to have a signature...
It can take up to 30 minutes after your 5th post is approved for the permissions to be granted.

Yah, it's been days.

Edited September 6, 2013 by Supernovy
signature fixed

Well we've taken a look at it and you do indeed have the permissions to set up a signature; it seems like you even did so yourself. When you post, make sure the "show signature" checkbox is checked. As you can see just above, Supernovy edited your post to check it and your signature is now showing.

Well darn, I've been wondering about that. I mostly just lurk, but I want ribbons

post 3/5

Good to know. I have been searching my profile for a way to add my ribbons.

spelling
Ah, I was just trying to figure out the signature thing myself this is good to know. Thanks.
